title: Piano Girl: A Memoir: Lessons in Life, Music, and the Perfect Blue Hawaiian
description: This is the story of one woman's accidental career as a cocktail lounge piano player. Connecting the people she has met with the places she has played and the pianos she has known, Robin Meloy Goldsby discovers the human side, for better or worse, of her audiences â€“ mobsters and moguls, the down-and-out, the downright scary, and ordinary people dealing with life in extraordinary ways.
author: Robin Meloy Goldsby
